<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lost in the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=7726) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Shining Kingdoms](/Sources.aspx?ID=265) pg. 170

**Archetype** [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=319)

**Prerequisites**
[Lion Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=7724)

</column>

---

You’ve learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the flicker of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=2372) from crowds to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405), gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to your [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures and a +4 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

<title level="2">Lost in the Crowd leads to...</title>
[Crowd Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=7727), [Interposing Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=7729)
name: Lost in the Crowd
